name: boxlife
description: boxlife is a tiny first person metroidvania, where you gain abilities, find secrets and escape from the box
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 2.3GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 610 DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews.review_text: Short, simple, nice to look at. If you don't have time for games and you're tired of people's BS you can probably pick this one up for 49 cents
Nice game... actually really nice for the price
